description: Try our easy to follow Chickpea Flour Socca With Herb & Green Olive Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Egg free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chickpea Flour Socca With Herb & Green Olive Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the batter, in a medium mixing bowl add the chickpea flour, paprika,garlic powder, salt, 2 tablespoons of the olive oil, and 240ml of water. Whisk to combine. Let rest at room temperature for 1 hour.
With the rack in the middle of the oven, place two 20cm cast-iron orovenproof frying pans in the oven and preheat to the highest setting. (Thepans will heat up with the oven.)

When the frying pans are heated, carefully remove and swirl 1 1/2 teaspoons of oil around in each. Pour half the batter into eachand return to the oven. Bake for 8 minutes. Then turn the grill onto a lowsetting and cook for an additional 2 minutes. Remove and let rest for 1-2minutes.

Meanwhile, to make the herb and olive salad, toss together the rocket,parsley, basil, olives, and lemon juice. Place each socca on a serving plateand top with an equal amount of salad. Serve immediately.
